document.name: CHomeViewCtrl

group.heading: G E T C O N N E C T E D
group.text: Welcome to Shareaza! אתה לא מחובר לשום רשת שתיוף קבצים

group.heading: ח י פ ו ש S H A R E A Z A
ע ד כ ו ן ה ו ד ע ת
W A R N I N G - Y O U A R E F I R E W A L L E D
group.text: Shareaza has detected that you are behind a NAT router or firewall, and are unable to receive connections from the Internet.
This may cause poor download performance.
group.link: Click here to learn how to configure your router or firewall

document.heading: L I S T E N T O N E W M U S I C
ה ת א מ ה א י ש י ת S H A R E A Z A
document.text: - ש נ ה א ת ה מ ר א ה ש ל Shareaza's

group.heading: R E M O T E A C C E S S I S E N A B L E D
group.text: Shareaza Remote Access is enabled. Control Shareaza using your web browser at:
אתה עדין לא מוריד שום קובץ
לא הורדת שום קבצים חדשים לאחרונה

para.text: You have not uploaded any files today.

document.name: CGeneralSettingsGroup
document.title: General
document.text: The Shareaza Settings Manager allows advanced users to completely customise how Shareaza works. The settings in the
section relate to the user experience.
Common user interface settings like tooltips, minimise behaviour, number formats, prompts, etc.
Presentation and management of the file library, and opening files.
When and where to use the built-in Shareaza Media Centre.
Your profile, chat and instant messaging settings.
Integrate Shareaza with your web browser to accept peer-to-peer links and download content.

document.name: CInternetSettingsGroup
document.title: Internet
document.text: The Shareaza Settings Manager allows advanced users to completely customise how Shareaza works. The settings in the
section control how Shareaza interacts with other nodes within distributed peer-to-peer networks.
The speeds and capabilities of your Internet connection.
Download throughput, scheduling, verification, timeouts and management.
Upload capacity, queuing, banning, timeouts and special requests.
Set up the ability to control Shareaza remotely through a web browser.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Select
document.text: This is where files currently being downloaded are displayed. You can view individual sources by expanding each file with the small + on the left.
You can also use this command to get help information on a specific download. Simply select a download and choose this command again.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Completed
document.text: "shareaza" סיימה להוריד את הקובץ, ואימתה שהקובץ תקין ב100 אחוז. הקובץ הוזז לתיקיות ההורדת שלך.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Moving
document.text: Shareaza סיים להוריד את הקובץ, והוא מוודא שהקובץ אמיתי הקובץ יועבר לתקיית ההורדות שלך

document.name: DownloadHelp.Paused
document.text: הפסקת את ההורדה אם ברצונך לחדש אותה אתה יכול ללחוץ על can click the

document.name: DownloadHelp.DiskFull
document.text: "shareaza" השהה את ההורדה אוטומתית בגלל חוסר מקום בדיסק הקשיח שלך או בגלל שאי ניתן לכתוב לקובץ ההורדה. אם ברצונך להמשיך להוריד, פנה מקום בדיסק הקשיח או/ו תבדוק את נגישות תיקיית ההורדות שלא השולמו, ואז המשך את ההורדה

document.name: DownloadHelp.Verifying
document.text: ההורדה הסתיימה וושארזה מבטיחה עכשיו שהקובץ שהורד הוא בדיוק כמו המקוריאם יש איזה שהם חלקים פגומים שארזה תתקן אותם באופן אוטומטי

document.name: DownloadHelp.Downloading
document.text: This download is currently in progress. If it is downloading too slowly, you could try searching the network for more sources with the
command. If the speed does not improve it may be due to limited upload speeds of the users you are downloading from. Download speed usually increases over time.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Pending
document.text: This download is waiting for someone to start uploading. Shareaza is ready to start downloading this file, but no-one is sending it at the moment. You are probably waiting in other user's queues, and the download may start transfering at any time. You can examine the individual sources to see each queue you are waiting in. If you are sharing files yourself, it may improve the chances of a download transfer starting quickly.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Queued
document.text: This download is waiting for some of your other downloads to complete. Your download settings limit the number of downloads which may be active at any given time, to ensure that each download gets a good share of the available bandwidth. You can change these settings via Tools, Shareaza Settings. Alternatively, you may manually start this download with the resume command.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Searching
document.text: There are no known sources for this download, so Shareaza is searching all connected P2P networks for new sources. Once sources are found, the download will start automatically. Shareaza searches for sources automatically, however you can speed up the process using the

Unfortunately in many cases there may be no users online who have the file you are looking for. The only course of action here is to wait for someone to come online, or cancel it and try to find a similar file which is more widely available.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Creating
document.text: Shareaza is pre-allocating a file in which to store this download, to save time later.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Tracker
document.text: The BitTorrent tracker server for this download appears to be down or malfunctioning. Shareaza is unable to contact it to receive a list of downloader peers.

document.name: UploadHelp
document.text: This is where queues and uploads are displayed. You can expand each queue with the small + on the left, and filter what is displayed with the button on the right on the window toolbar.

document.name: GeneralHelp.DiskSpace
document.text: The amount of free space on one or more drives used by Shareaza is low.

You should always attempt to keep a reasonable amount of disk space free. Programs can become unstable if the drives become full, and temporary files may be lost. You should run a disk clean-up, delete unwanted files, or un-install software you no longer need.

document.name: GeneralHelp.XPsp2
document.text: Shareaza has detected Windows XP Service Pack 2. This restricts the number of connections that applications can attempt at once.

Shareaza has limited network connections and set appropriate default values to ensure proper operation, however performance may be reduced. Please visit the Shareaza forums for further information, and up to date news.

document.name: GeneralHelp.AdultFilter
document.text: Please note that (as with any automated filter) it may not be 100% effective at screening content. It is designed simply to filter out excess unwanted results, rather than as a 100% safe block.
Children's Internet use (including P2P file sharing) should always be under parental supervision.

document.name: SearchHelp.BadSearch
document.text: This search is poorly formatted, and may not function correctly. Searches should include several terms where possible, and should specify a schema (file type). Furthermore, searches must not be limited to numbers or negative terms only, and you should avoid overly general queries.
Most clients on the network will ignore a search for all MP3 files, for example, because it is not specific enough and would generate too many results.

document.name: SearchHelp.AdultSearch
document.text: The specified search would probably return a large number of results with adult content, and this has been turned off in the settings. You should either re-phrase the search, or disable the filter.
To disable the filter, go into Tools > Settings > General and un-check the adult content filter.

document.name: ShareHelp.AlreadyShared
document.text: The folder you have selected is already being shared as part of an existing share.

document.name: ShareHelp.BadShare
document.text: This folder should not be shared
This folder is (or contains) a system folder. Sharing this folder is not recommended, since most of the files in it are of no use to other people.
Folders such as the Windows directory, Program Files, and similar folders do not usually contain files suitable for sharing. Any files of interest would be in sub-folders located
these folders. Please share those instead.
The Shareaza 'incomplete' folder should also not be shared through the library, since attempting to hash downloads in progress may impact on performance.

!Welcome to Shareaza (version) !
.
Shareaza is completely free software.
Please use it responsibly and respect intellectual property law.
.

There are no active searches. Click here to search for files.

Are you sure you want to delete the "%s" skin? This cannot be undone.
This is a pre-release version of Shareaza, and the beta testing period has ended. Please download the full, official release from www.shareaza.com.
Changing view will close any windows you have open. Would you like to change now?

Accepting incoming TCP connections on %s port %i.
Outgoing connections will be from %s port %i.
Can't resolve %s for outgoing connections. Outgoing connections will use the default interface.
Firewalled, not listening for incoming connections.
Listening for UDP datagrams on %s port %i.
Security manager barred a connection to %s.
The address %s is already blocked by your security rules.
Added a security rule to block %s.
Are you sure you want to disconnect?

Forcing your PC into hub mode may have adverse effects on performance and the P2P network It is generally better to allow Shareaza to decide whether or not hub mode should be used.

Hub mode does NOT produce better search results, or have any other advantages for you.

Do you really want to do this, despite these disadvantages?
Disabling support for Gnutella-1 protocols may limit your search results, and if you are acting as a hub it may also impact upon the results of other users. Are you sure you want to do this?
Gnutella2 is Shareaza's premiere network. Disabling support for it may severely limit both the number and quality of your search results. Are you SURE you want to do this?
Your outgoing bandwidth is too low to enable this network

Initiating a neighbour connection to %s port %i...

Closing connection to neighbour %s due to lack of traffic.

Already connected to %s, will not establish a second connection.
Closed connection with neighbour %s because it is not a hub.

Handshake with %s failed due to invalid data on the wire.
Closing surplus connection from %s with host hint (%s port %i).

Refusing connection from %s because this is a shielded leaf node.

Neighbour %s updated its query routing table (%i bit = %lu[%i], %i%% full).

This option uses services provided by Bitzi.com for recognising and sharing information about selected files.

Shareaza will transmit the SHA1 hash code for the selected file(s) in order to query the Bitzi database. If you are concerned about privacy, you may wish to consult the Bitzi.com privacy policy.

Would you like to proceed?
Are you sure you want to permenantly delete the %i selected file(s) ?\n\nThe files will be moved to your "recycle bin" if it is enabled.

Your downloaded files folder "%s" is not yet in your library.

Including your downloaded files folder in your library makes it easier to view and organise new downloads, and lets you take advantage of advanced Shareaza features such as download verification and automatic upgrading. Placing downloaded files in your library does not necessarily require you to share them: you can choose whether or not to share files independently.

You can use your Gnutella User Profile to share information about yourself, your interests and recommended files and websites with others.
הפעל שיתוף קבצים עם משתמש תואם
Use Shareaza to open these types of links:
Use Shareaza to manage all my web downloads:
The download manager plugin will only attempt to download file types listed here. Other file types will be handled by your web browser. Shareaza must be running to manage downloads.
Only download and upload to networks which are connected.

Shareaza Remote Access allows you to leave Shareaza running on your PC, and control it remotely using a web browser. You will need to be able to accept incoming connections to use this feature (i.e. properly configured router, etc).

The scheduler is designed to allow you to set times when Shareaza will connect and download files.
Note: If you have Shareaza open while the scheduler is active, you may see it changing settings- This is normal!-

Shareaza is a general-purpose file-sharing application that can access many P2P networks at the same time. On this page you can select which P2P networks you want to connect to, and then adjust specific settings for each network.
The Gnutella2 network is Shareaza's premiere network, offering more features and performance than any other P2P net. Highly recommended.
The eDonkey2000 network is a popular server-based network. While not as feature-rich as Gnutella2, eDonkey2000 has an impressive file collection.
Although the original Gnutella network is less feature-rich than Gnutella2, and has fewer files than eDonkey2000, it remains a valuable resource.
Search known remote servers in the server cache:
Download eDonkey2000 serverlist from the web:
Enable EndGame mode when completing torrents
If you haven't used Shareaza or another P2P client before, this QuickStart wizard can help you configure your copy in a few simple steps.
If you're a more advanced user, you can access the full range of Shareaza's options via the Tools menu. Click Exit to close the wizard at any time.
This wizard will assist you to:
Tell Shareaza about your Internet connection
Connect to your choice of P2P networks, and
Shareaza supports two different user interfaces, so you can choose the one which is most comfortable for you.
Please select one of these two user interfaces:
Simple, easy to use menus and buttons. Familiar to users of other file sharing programs.
Power mode offers expert users lots of extra commands, windows, etc.
For optimum performance, Shareaza needs to know a little bit about your connection to the Internet.
( please select )| I am using the Internet at home| I am using the Internet on a college LAN| I am using the Internet on a office LAN| I am using the Internet at a hotel or airport
Is your network or campus protected by a firewall or NAT router?
No, I CAN accept all incoming connections| Yes, so I CANNOT accept incoming connections from the Internet| I don't know, please AUTO-DETECT the firewalled state
Do you have a firewall or NAT router on your home Internet connection?

No, I have FULL ACCESS to the Internet| Yes, but I will set up port-forwarding for Shareaza| Yes, so I CANNOT accept incoming connections from the Internet| I don't know, please AUTO-DETECT the firewalled state
If you know how fast your Internet connection is able to operate, select the best option below:
| Dial up Modem| ISDN| ADSL (256K)| ADSL (512K)| ADSL (768K)| ADSL (1.5M)| Cable Modem/SDSL| T1| T3| LAN| OC3
P2P networks are only as good as the people who use them. All of the content available for download is being shared by another user.
You do not have to share content to use Shareaza, however some software will behave differently to users who are not sharing anything.
Please indicate which folders, if any, you wish to share. Simply click the Add button to add a new folder.
WARNING: Distributing copyrighted works is an offence in most countries.
Shareaza is a much friendlier place when everyone writes a few basic details about themselves.

Shareaza is a general-purpose file-sharing application that can access many P2P networks at the same time. Here you can select which networks you'd like to access. Note that you can always select different networks later.
The Gnutella2 network is Shareaza's premiere network, offering more features and performance than any other P2P net.
The eDonkey2000 network is a popular server-based network. While not as feature-rich as Gnutella2, eDonkey2000 has an impressive file collection.
Although the original Gnutella network is less feature-rich than Gnutella2, and has fewer files than eDonkey2000, it remains a valuable resource.
Shareaza has detected that you have another eDonkey2000 program installed on your computer. Would you like to import any unfinished downloads into Shareaza?
That's it! Shareaza has been configured to work with your computer.
If you ever need to change your settings, you can re-run this QuickStart wizard by selecting it from the Tools menu.
After closing this wizard by clicking Finish, you can connect to the networks you selected and start searching and downloading content.
Connect to the network when I close this wizard
Connect to the network every time I start Shareaza
Start Shareaza every time Windows starts
Allow others to browse my user profile
Other Gnutella users browsing your profile and shared files will see your avatar. Custom avatars should be 128x128 pixels, and can be in any supported image file on your PC.
Favourite files are recommended to users who browse your profile. You can create favourite files by adding them to the "Favourites" library folder.

Gnutella users are identified by a globally unique identifier and a corresponding public and private key pair. Normally there is no need to generate a new ID, however Shareaza provides this option for advanced users.
Initiate a new connection to host or server:|Browse this host:
Downloading any file with Shareaza is easy. Simply type or paste the URL or URI describing the file into the box below and press Enter.
Shareaza can download files from the web (HTTP), and automatically search and download P2P links (Magnet, Gnutella, eDonkey2000, mP2P).

Shareaza can also download BitTorrent files. A torrent can be described by an xyz.torrent file, or a HTTP link to the .torrent file. To download a torrent HTTP link, paste it in the box above. If you already have a .torrent file, click Open Torrent:
Only show matches which include the _words:
( you can also exclude words with -word )
Close this window when the download completes

This is a list of folders in your library. You can add and remove folders using the buttons on the right. When you add a new folder it is initially shared with other users, however you can unshare it from the Shareaza library if you wish.
You can copy a URI for the selected item in a variety of different formats. Please choose the format you wish to use by clicking one of the URIs below:

(copying downloaded chunks to a new preview file)
Did you know Shareaza is a 100% free product?

Shareaza does NOT contain ANY "spyware", "adware" or other bundled software. It does NOT display any advertisements or "popups", ever.{n}{n}If you ever see advertising or "popups" while using Shareaza, be assured that they are NOT coming from this program.
Unfortunately a lot of other software does come with undesirable adware or spyware, so if you see something suspicious you may wish to check your PC with an advertising or spyware removal program.

You should not have had to pay any money to obtain Shareaza. Shareaza can be freely downloaded by anyone from www.shareaza.com. If you paid someone money for Shareaza, you should demand a full refund immediately.
We hope you have enjoyed using Shareaza so far. We believe it is the best file sharing application around.
Unfortunately, a lot of file sharers don't know what they're missing!
If you know someone who would like Shareaza, whether they're a new user or someone still putting up with an inferior product, why not let them know there is a better alternative?
Chances are they'll be grateful you rescued them!

A new version of Shareaza is now available. Would you like to upgrade?
If you select Upgrade Now, Shareaza will add the upgrade to your download queue and automatically begin downloading it.
